variants.Description in input context: Pathogenic mutations in LRRK2 (e.g., kinase-dead version) were studied for their effects on inclusion body formation and cell death.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell culture and kinase activity manipulation

Material used.Description: Experiments involved neurons and neuronal cell lines to study the effects of LRRK2 kinase activity on inclusion body formation and cell death.

Readout description.Conclusion: Inhibition of LRRK2 kinase activity reduced inclusion body formation and delayed cell death.
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Reduction in toxic protein aggregation and neurodegeneration.
Readout description.Result Description: Replacing the kinase domain with a kinase-dead version blocked inclusion body formation and reduced cell death in neuronal models.
